text:
I think everyone in the game industry acknowledges that Miyamoto is one of the greatest designers in software history. His products all have that very gentle ramp of difficulty. I think most of us making non-game products aspire to have this kind of gentle learning curve, but it is indeed very difficult and takes a lot of skill to make a product gradual.

And <@UD3AK9JRF> i agree wholeheartedly that better languages will make it much easier to make good software, and make the ramp for building these products a lot more gentle. I am appalled by how complex the current stack is for web and app development.
